about_the_game:
UPDATE 2021: Still under development! More info coming soon...
DodgeBall: Unleashed is an action packed, first person arena style pvp game, with different maps to explore and use to your advantage throughout matches. Play multiple game modes with different objectives and teams to improve your characters stats/traits.



  • Solo: Play against an entire team; with only you on your side. You better move quick and keep dodging to not get hit!
  • Elimination: Which ever team loses all of their players first is the defeated team. Work alongside your team to stay alive!
  • Survival: The first team to reach a target amount of points is declared the winner. While there is infinite lives, don't think you can get away with that!
  • Domination: The team with the most points at the end of a set time is declared the winner! Now is the time to get combo shots!

Enjoy the satisfaction of pelting balls at your opponents and watching them fly across the map! With dodging, jumping and ducking abilities, this makes for an intense DodgeBall session in the convenience of your home.

ABOUT ME
My name is Trent Barta, I'm 18 years old and have been working on DodgeBall: Unleashed since I graduated high school in 2018. This is my first game I've published and am excited to present it to you all. I've had an interest in programming since I was 10 years old and since then I have been developing my skills to enable me to produce video games. I'm an indie developer and everything in this game is made by me.

name: DodgeBall: Unleashed

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews:
“I'm proud of you son! I had a fun time testing this game with you.”
My Dad
short_description: DodgeBall: Unleashed - Are you ready to put your balls on the line? In this action packed game; dodge, duck, dive, dip and dodge enemy fire, while playing on big maps, attempting to annihilate the other team by pelting balls at them.
